data.name: Furry Shakespeare: Two Incredibly Ripped, Absolutely Shredded Noble Kinsmen: Armchair Patriots Outfit Pack
data.detailed_description:
New outfits for:

- Emilia
- King Theseus
- Hippolyta
- Jenny
- Paul

To use:

1) You will be prompted at the start of the game to pick which outfits you want for the cast: regular or DLC.
